sections.heading: Care Grant Fund; established; use; investment
sections.text: The Child Care Grant Fund is hereby established to be administered by the Department of Health and Human Services. The fund shall be used to make grants pursuant to section 43-2624. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the

43-2622.Child Care Grant Fund; established; use; investment.

The Child Care Grant Fund is hereby established to be administered by the Department of Health and Human Services. The fund shall be used to make grants pursuant to section 43-2624. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 836, ยง 23;Laws 1994, LB 1066, ยง 29;Laws 1996, LB 1044, ยง 230;Laws 1997, LB 307, ยง 100.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
